summary: Import a data cube from the user workspace
description: Loads a data cube from the user's workspace by specifying its name and folder location. This function allows previously saved data cubes to be accessed for further analysis or processing.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the data cube to import from the workspace.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The path to the folder in the user workspace where the data cube is stored.

returns.description: The imported data cube object, containing multi-dimensional data such as spatial, spectral, or temporal information.
